mapper.insert: insert into purchase_income_submit(submit_id,code,count,submit_time,status,production_line_id,bill_no) values (#{submit_id},#{code},#{count},#{submit_time},0, select id from production_line where name = #{production_line_id}, #{bill_no})
mapper.select: select * from purchase_income_submit p inner join user u on p.submit_id = u.id where p.status = 0 or p.status = 1;
